scenario_text.value: Wow... There really is a dam here!

I can’t believe humans could build something
so big!

But if this isn’t from this world...how did
something so huge end up here?

Who knows? This’s been here for as long as
I can remember.
(So like a few years?)

(Then again, if Agumon’s anything to go by,
it could even be a few days ago...)
There’s nobody here either.
In that case, are they inside?
It’s possible. Where’s the entrance...?
Are you going in? Better be careful!

This area’s the den of a really nasty
creature called Fangmon.

That jerk has been trying to force us into
being its henchmen!

Those kids might be in real trouble.
We’d better find them before Fangmon does...

Fangmon...
He can hide his presence...

But...
Wait, what’s that over there?

I think I see someone...
Yes, it’s Saki and Shuuji!
And...there’s something huge chasing them!!!

Ah! There it is! That’s the Fangmon jerk
I just talked about!
Really?!
Oh no! They’re in danger!
But we can hardly get there in time!
(What to do? No time to think!)
Get its attention!
Just hurry!
(I’ll get its attention and buy some time!)

Hey, fathead!
You’ll have to get through us!
(Good. It’s looking at us!)
Everyone, hurry!
Just hurry! Quick!
Okay!
Got it!

Hang on!
Don’t leave me behind!
